articles.author: Deidre McPhillips
articles.title: Ob/gyn group advises against cannabis use during pregnancy, recommends universal screening - CNN
articles.description: New guidance from the American College of Obstetricians and Gynecologists advises that people abstain from cannabis use during pregnancy and lactation and recommends that providers ask all of their patients about cannabis use before, during and after pregnanc…
articles.content: New guidance from the American College of Obstetricians and Gynecologists advises that people abstain from cannabis use during pregnancy and lactation and recommends that providers ask all of their p… [+5839 chars]
